callbehavioraction.icon: INCOSE SEP Exam Study Group - Session 3, Team 4 Study Deliverable_files/icon_callbehavioraction_1605347181.jpg
callbehavioraction.documentation: As the system and system elements are defined in the Technical Processes, the information items that represent those definitions should be captured and included as knowledge assets for the domain. The infrastructure should be established to include mechanisms to easily identify, access, and determine the applicability of the assets.
callbehavioraction.qualifiedName: Organizational Poject-Enabling Processes::Knowledge Management::Knowledge Management::Share knowledge assets throughout the organization::Define or acquire the knowledge assets applicable to the domain, including system and software elements, and share them across the organization
